# searchDictationBehavior(_:)

**Instance Method**

Configures the dictation behavior for any search fields configured by the searchable modifier.

## Declaration

```swift
nonisolated func searchDictationBehavior(_ dictationBehavior: TextInputDictationBehavior) -> some View

```

## Discussion

By default, search fields on visionOS will automatically start dictation when looking at the dictation button in the search field. You can change this behavior by providing a value of [doc://com.apple.SwiftUI/documentation/SwiftUI/TextInputDictationBehavior/preventDictation] to this modifier.

See the [doc://com.apple.SwiftUI/documentation/SwiftUI/TextInputDictationBehavior] type for more information on the available dictation behaviors.
